page.description: Class that wraps the wkhtmltppdf utility to convert HTML content to PDF. The helper::HtmlToPdf Class class allows you to convert HTML to PDF or a URL to PDF. The following example code can be pasted into a new script in the Code editor and executed.

section.example:
dim hp as helper::HtmlToPdf dim html as c html = <<%html%

This is So Cool

Generate PDF from HTML!

This shows how you can turn any html into a pdf

%html% dir_create_recurse("c:\mypdffiles") hp.SaveHTMLToPdf(html,"c:\mypdffiles\mypdf.pdf") 'now open the file sys_open("c:\mypdffiles\mypdf.pdf")

property.name: units
property.description: String units property. The units that all measurements are in (e.g. margin_left, page_height, etc.). default is "in" (inches). options are: "cm", "mm", "pt" (points), "tw" (twips - 20th of a point), "px" (pixels)

property.name: page_size
property.description: String page_size property. The size of the page. Options include "A4", "Letter", etc. Default is "A4"

property.name: page_height
property.description: Numeric page_height property. Page height expression in setting for units

property.name: page_width
property.description: Numeric page_width property. Page width expression in setting for units

property.name: landscape
property.description: Logical landscape property, .t. or .f. - If .t. then use landscape mode.

property.name: grayscale
property.description: Logical grayscale property, .t. or .f. - default .f. - if .t. then pdf does not use colors.

property.name: enable_forms
property.description: Logical enable_forms property, .t. or .f. - default .f. - if .t. then input controls in the HTML become input controls in the PDF file.

property.name: margin_left
property.description: Numeric margin_left property. Margin expression in setting for units

property.name: margin_top
property.description: Numeric margin_top property. Margin expression in setting for units

property.name: margin_bottom
property.description: Numeric margin_bottom property. Margin expression in setting for units

property.name: image_quality
property.description: Numeric image_quality property. Numeric value that controls the amount of compression of embedded jpeg images. default is 94 - 100 is no compression.

property.name: javascript_delay
property.description: Numeric javascript_delay property. If the html page contains javascript code that runs when the page renders, the amount of time in milliseconds to wait before generating the PDF. Allows long running Javascript to complete before conversion starts.

property.name: smart_shrinking
property.description: Logical smart_shrinking property. Enable WebKit's 'intelligent shrinking' strategy. Makes the pixel/dpi ratio variable.

methodref.name: Movecookie
methodref.description: Move a block of cookie items.

methodref.name: SaveHTMLToPdf
methodref.description: Generate a PDF from a given html.

methodref.name: SaveUrlToPdf
methodref.description: Generate a PDF from a given url. Retrieves html from a url and converts the html to a PDF file.
